channel.title: Upcoming shows on Income Tax Refund
channel.description: Recent content in Upcoming shows on Income Tax Refund

item.title: Dr. Best + face stealer + game boy advance + Onisuka Tiger
item.description: i.t.r. presents game boy advance (psych, Kyiv) Dr. Best (plastic punk, Halle) face stealer (cave exploration soundtrack, Leipzig) Onisuka Tiger (garage, Kyiv) more info coming soon

item.title: Strzał w kolano + Zdrój + Ari Raketo & Piet + Clara Fall
item.description: i.t.r. presents Strzał w kolano (classical guitar knee shot / Wrocław) We’re stoked to have two acts from our much venerated music collective Salka coming to town once more. That’s the collective that already garlanded our shows with mind-expanding artists like the Kurws, the Przepych, the Atol Atol Atol or the Barłóg. This time our inner worlds will be perfused by Jakub Majchrzak (whom you know from the aforementioned Kurws or from Życia Żółć) and his befuddlingly ill-tempered guitar musings under the Strzał w kolano moniker.

item.title: The Zenmenn + Senthulà

item.title: Claws of Saurtopia Warm Up Show: Atol Atol Atol + Nape Neck + Ilia Gorowitz + Andarta
item.description: Claws of Saurtopia & i.t.r. resent: a warm up for the noise fest w/ Nape Neck live @ Sonic Protest Festival (video) live in Strasbourg (video) live @ SUPERNORMAL 2019 (video) bandcamp Atol Atol Atol live in Gdańsk (video) Sto nieodebranych połączeń (OMV) Atol Atol Atol (OMV) Ilia Gorowitz https://iliagorovitz.bandcamp.com Andarta https://andartagroup.bandcamp.com more info coming soon
